paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted information on the BRCA2 variant c.1813delA found in a patient with pancreatic adenocarcinoma.

individual_records.phenotype_details: diagnosed with pancreatic adenocarcinoma with liver metastases
individual_records.evidence_sentence: The BRCA2 mutation was found in samples from the right hepatic vein [(c.1813delA, p. (I605fs*9), variant allele frequency (VAF) 7.22% (coverage: 194 reads)]

functional_data.summary: The presence of the BRCA2 mutation indicated treatment with platinum drugs and the PARP inhibitor Olaparib.

variants.evidence_level: Strong evidence based on clinical presentation and treatment response
variants.additional_notes: The mutation was not detected in the peripheral sample.
key_quotes: The BRCA2 mutation was found in samples from the right hepatic vein [(c.1813delA, p. (I605fs*9), variant allele frequency (VAF) 7.22% (coverage: 194 reads)]

extraction_metadata.notes: Only one BRCA2 variant was reported in the paper.
